title: A RESOLUTION APPROVING AND ADOPTING THE MUNICIPAL DISASTER RISK REDUCTION AND MANAGEMENT COUNCIL (MDRRMC) RESOLUTION NO. 2025- 06 DATED JULY 25, 2025, ENTITLED, ”RESOLUTION REALIGNING THE APPROPRIATION FOR THE INDEMNIFICATION UNDER THE 5% MUNICIPAL DISASTER  RISK  REDUCTION AND MANAGEMENT FUND  CURRENT APPROPRIATION CY 2025 AMOUNTING TO ONE HUNDRED THOUSAND PESOS (PHP 100,000.00) FOR VARIOUS PURPOSES AND APPROVING THE SAME.” Reduction and Management Act of 20107 was approved on 27 May 2010 and its corresponding Implementing Rules and Regulations (IRR) signed on September 27, 2010;
